K

KnowledgeCache - Class in com.ethercis.ehr.knowledge
Look up and caching for archetypes, openEHR showTemplates and Operational Templates.
KnowledgeCache(ClusterController) - Constructor for class com.ethercis.ehr.knowledge.KnowledgeCache
default constructor, use environment variables and/or user directory
KnowledgeCache(ClusterController, String, KnowledgeCache.KnowledgeType) - Constructor for class com.ethercis.ehr.knowledge.KnowledgeCache
constructor using explicit directory declaration the constructor scans the environment variables and user directory as well.
KnowledgeCache(ClusterController, Properties) - Constructor for class com.ethercis.ehr.knowledge.KnowledgeCache
initialize with properties passed from a ServiceInfo context the following are valid service properties: knowledge.path.archetype knowledge.path.template knowledge.path.opt
KnowledgeCache.KnowledgeType - Enum in com.ethercis.ehr.knowledge
utility class to identify a file extension from a qualifier
